sourcesContent: import*as s from"react";import{Box as i,safelySpreadBoxProps as a}from"@twilio-paste/box";const o=({display:e,color:r,size:p,...t})=>s.createElement(i,{...a(t),lineHeight:"lineHeight0",display:e,color:r,size:p});o.defaultProps={as:"span",display:"block",color:"currentColor",size:"sizeIcon30"},o.displayName="IconWrapper";export{o as IconWrapper};
